ValidationRule.description: Rule that requires users to enter a Closed Lost Reason if an opportunity is marked Closed Lost.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( TEXT(Closed_Reason__c) ), ISPICKVAL( StageName ,"Closed Lost"), OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Hip", RecordType.DeveloperName = "Revenue_Growth", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Extremities", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Trauma", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Foot_and_Ankle_Sales", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Cement", RecordType.DeveloperName = "US_Early_Intervention", RecordType.DeveloperName = "AM_US_SM_Sales"), AND( ($Profile.Name <> "AM-US-Sales Management"), ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator"), ($Profile.Name <> "Zimmer Integration Profile") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a Closed Reason for this Closed Lost Opportunity.
